attributes.action: REFUSE  another lockdown. Let the county get back to normal
attributes.additional_details:
Enough is enough now. This country has complied for almost two years. 
There will always be new variants but numbers of deaths are not rising. 
The numbers will rise for those who will suffer mentally if we keep being forced to comply. 
Yet again those with serious illnesses will be made to wait even longer for treatment. 
Stop with all the lateral flow testing. They are not even accurate. 
When did we become such a nodding dog nation?
If MPs can live a normal life then we have every right to as well
attributes.background:
Enough is enough now. This country has complied for almost two years. 
Yet MPs can break the rules day in day out and blatantly lie their way out of trouble. 
This country needs to start running properly again.
Plan A Plan B….Plan Z when does it end???

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the prospect of additional Covid-19 restrictions, but we're not sure if you want the Government to commit to not implementing another lockdown, remove all existing restrictions, or something else.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Repeal the Coronavirus Act: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592632
